reviews.review_msg: makes you feel very uncomfortable in class (especially for first year students). encourages you to speak then embarrasses you if you're wrong. a year later- shes my least favourite professor.

Extremely engaging and passionate speaker. Encourages open and critical thinking. High expectations, but a fair and constructive marker. I walk away feeling better equipped to handle higher level courses. Work load felt a bit much at times, but it's first year and it only gets harder from here on out. Lectures and tutorials are just plain fun.
I agree with everything else that previous rated her .

Wow, if you like being asked "why?" over and over again then this class is for you! Her lectures are all over the place and when you look at your notes, you have no idea whats going on. Definitely think of another class.
